name: ICARUS (itch) (NoamSemo)
description:
"Never regret thy fall, O Icarus of the fearless
flight, for the greatest tragedy of them all,
is never to feel the burning light."

                                                  

Icarus is a single-player game based on the Greek myth
of the same name. As Icarus, the player must use their
wings to fly and avoid obstacles while avoiding flying
too close to the sun. The game mechanics are inspired
by the popular mobile game Flappy Bird.

Designer: Noam Semo
Guidance : Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan
Art & Interaction course, Gaming 
Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2022
